_sText:
gg_pokemon_fire

Update: Fixed credit issues.

This map has a very obvious "Pokemon" Theme, splashed with the qualities of a GG map. It is symmetric to provide an even battlefield for both sides.

Inside the what I will call the "maze" is a hidden trapdoor that contains a keypad. When the correct sequence is entered a single grenade will be dispensed. The bridge that stretches over the lava is actually breakable, so watch your step or you will fall into a death trap.


Please leave feedback on issues or problems surrounding the map.
